panels.description: Wide shot. Full moon, dark. A small silhouette walking along the road almost coming out of the forest.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: So... that's what war is

panels.name: HL-I-A-1

panels.description: Zoom in. The man's feet walking forward.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: I am leaving my country with a heavy load upon me

panels.name: HL-I-A-2A

panels.description: The man's profile can be seen. It is full of anguish and fear. His eyes are fixed onto something.
panels.name: HL-I-A-2B

panels.description: A countryside road goes from a forest towards a river. In the distance, a guard post. Beyond the post, a bridge.
panels.name: HL-I-A-3

panels.description: (from behind) The man crouches at the end of the forest putting down his weight and looks out towards the river.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: ... A load that will never leave me.

panels.name: HL-I-A-4A

panels.description: Zoom in to the post's guards from the man's standpoint.
panels.name: HL-I-A-4B

panels.description: The man looks into that direction.
panels.name: HL-I-A-5A

panels.description: The man looks into a different direction.
panels.name: HL-I-A-5B

panels.description: A bit south of the bridge and the post there is a wide tree that stretches onto the strong river, almost reaching the opposite bank.
panels.name: HL-I-A-6

panels.description: The man takes up his weight again...
panels.name: HL-I-A-7

panels.description: Zoom onto the man and the weight

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Yet, when it all started everything looked so exciting...

panels.name: HL-I-A-8

panels.description: ...and goes down the vantage point towards the river crossing. The weight is a dead body.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: But now HE is dead, and so am I.

panels.name: HL-I-A-9

panels.description: Wide shot. Far off Birun and Ayran face to face with sticks.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Some time before...

panels.name: HL-I-B-1

panels.description: Zoom in.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Birun! Commend your soul to Ashtalan the almighty, cause you're gonna meet her soon!

panels.name: HL-I-B-2

panels.description: Ayran, starting the attack.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: WAAAH!

panels.name: HL-I-B-3

panels.description: Ayran hitting.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Ayran, you son of a blind raccoon! I'll show you now!

panels.name: HL-I-B-4

panels.description: Birun jumps.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: HA!

panels.name: HL-I-B-5

panels.description: Birun hitting back.
panels.name: HL-I-B-6

panels.description: Birun kicks Ayran in face.
panels.name: HL-I-B-7

panels.description: Birun kicks Ayran in stomach.
panels.name: HL-I-B-8

panels.description: Birun tears Ayran down.
panels.name: HL-I-B-9

panels.description: Ayran reacts.
panels.name: HL-I-B-10

panels.description: Ayran stands up.
panels.name: HL-I-B-11A

panels.description: Ayran overthrows Birun.
panels.name: HL-I-B-11B

panels.description: Ayran over Birun.
panels.name: HL-I-B-12

panels.description: Ayran raises fist.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Hey...

panels.name: HL-I-B-13

panels.description: Ayran's angry face.
panels.name: HL-I-B-14A

panels.description: Birun's scared face.
panels.name: HL-I-B-14B

panels.description: Ayran striking fist.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Go to hell!

panels.name: HL-I-B-15

panels.description: A girl's (Dilgun) hands stops Ayran's arm from punching Birun in the face.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Stop it!

panels.name: HL-I-C-1

panels.description: Ayran turns his face to Dilgun. Birun looking to her already, his face still scared.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: What the...

panels.name: HL-I-C-2

panels.description: Birun stands up, his face becoming more relaxed. Ayran looking to Dilgun. Dilgun speaking from outside.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Ayran, for Ashtalan's sake... Are you crazy?

panels.name: HL-I-C-3

panels.description: Dilgun crosses arms, evidently annoyed/upset and raises her chin.
panels.name: HL-I-C-4

panels.description: Dilgun looks to the sky.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: I only have one brother! Dilgun And I need him...

panels.name: HL-I-C-5A

panels.description: Dilgun looks to Ayran and Birun.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: to help me keep away the horde of stinky beasts who think I'm gorgeous!

panels.name: HL-I-C-5B

panels.description: Ayran faces Dilgun (side shot) and points finger onto her chest.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Your brother, whom I thought to be my best friend, just kicked me in the face!
Don't you tell me!

panels.name: HL-I-C-6A

panels.description: Ayran lowers his face and turns red.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Furthermore, you are not that gorgeous...

panels.name: HL-I-C-6B

panels.description: Dilgun takes Ayran's chin and lifts his face.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Of course I am, and you know it.
Melukkim girls are just too hot.

panels.name: HL-I-C-7

panels.description: Dilgun keeps on speaking with amused and challenging expression.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Unlike your Silkhan girls, who are no more than whitewashed housepets.

panels.name: HL-I-C-8

panels.description: Dilgun continues to Ayran pushing him back.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: ...just like you.
I mean, even my bro was able to beat the crap out of you!

panels.name: HL-I-C-9A

panels.description: Birun and Ayran, Dilgun's head from the back.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Hey!
Hey!

panels.name: HL-I-C-9B

panels.description: Birun to Dilgun.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Don't you speak to me like that little sister!

panels.name: HL-I-C-10A

panels.description: Birun turning to Ayran.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: And you, filthy beggar... Are you insane?!?

panels.name: HL-I-C-10B

panels.description: Birun facing Ayran.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: What was on your mind?!?
You could have killed me!

panels.name: HL-I-C-11

panels.description: Ayran to Birun, both angry. Dilgun between them trying to stop them.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: What was on my mind???
We were training for the stick fighting ritual, and out of the blue you started kicking me, you b...
Shut up now!

panels.name: HL-I-C-12

panels.description: Dilgun to Birun. Birun scratches his head.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Birun, it's time to go home. Lunch is ready.
Mum was already screaming at you when I left.

panels.name: HL-I-C-13

panels.description: Ayran to Birun. Now smiling and embracing him.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Once again the fates sent your little sister to save you, you screaming piglet!

panels.name: HL-I-C-14

panels.description: Birun, protesting. Both start walking away.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Ah, come on! I would certainly have dribbled that girly punch of yours and was ready to hit back.
Yes, yes... sure!

panels.name: HL-I-C-15

panels.description: Ayran keeps on walking with Birun, playing with the stick.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: But for the stick fight, my foreign friend, you'll just have to...
well, stick to... sticks! No kicks!

panels.name: HL-I-C-16

panels.description: Birun and Ayran. Birun makes a helpless face about the joke. Ayran turns serious.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Gosthal and his crew are certainly training hard...
we cannot allow them to win!

panels.name: HL-I-C-17

panels.description: Birun turning to him. Zoom out also including Dilgun who runs ahead.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Don't you worry, we'll show them something.
Come on you snails...
If you keep this pace while fighting you'll be screwed!

panels.name: HL-I-C-18

panels.description: Ayran and Birun start walking among the fields. Wide shot.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Birun, we really need to stand out during the fighting ritual...
It's the only chance we have in the foreseeable future to be noticed by the chief maintainers.

panels.name: HL-I-C-19

panels.description: Closer shot.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: I don't want to end up as a farmer, like...
Like your father?

panels.name: HL-I-C-20

panels.description: Ayran turns to Birun.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Yes, like the old tyrant.

panels.name: HL-I-C-21

panels.description: Detail of the environment.
panels.name: HL-I-C-22A

panels.description: Birun and Ayran from above.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Ayran, I might agree that your dad is not very likeable...

panels.name: HL-I-C-22B

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: ...but he crushes his back all day long to provide food and shelter for you and your sister.

panels.description: Ayran turns to Birun again.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: I don't care.
I'm just looking forward to being declared an adult by the chief maintainers.

panels.name: HL-I-C-24

panels.description: Ayran looks forward.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Then, I'll leave home and take good care of myself.
I'll become a respected soldier, and a famous chief maintainer.

panels.name: HL-I-C-25

panels.description: Birun smiles.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Hey, it's all about you... and what about me?

panels.name: HL-I-C-26A

panels.description: Ayran smiles too, proud and mocking.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Oh, you'll become a soldier too, but not as famous and respected as myself!

panels.name: HL-I-C-26B

panels.description: Birun looking at Ayran, thoughtful and very interested.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: And what will happen of your sister?

panels.name: HL-I-C-27

panels.description: Ayran also thoughtful.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Well, I don't know... she'll probably want to stay with dad, that's what she promised our mum.
And he's gonna ruin her life. Unless...
Unless?

panels.name: HL-I-C-28

panels.description: Ayran embraces Birun. Birun daydreams.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: ... unless her secret lover takes her far, far away!
Yes, why not? I'll take her to Melukka, the land of my ancestors.
There we'll settle and build our home...

panels.name: HL-I-C-29

panels.description: Birun wakes up.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: For all snakes! Dilgun is already home!
My mother will kill me!

panels.name: HL-I-C-30A

panels.description: Birun runs away.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: I'll see you in the afternoon!
Run little rabbit!

panels.name: HL-I-C-30B

panels.description: Ayran reaches his home, looks at it.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: There it is...

panels.name: HL-I-DA-1

panels.description: Ayran climbs the stairs.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Please...

panels.name: HL-I-DA-2A

panels.description: Ayran walks towards the door.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: ... let him be asleep...

panels.name: HL-I-DA-2B

panels.description:
Ayran getting in from the outside.  
Inside is dark with a man's silhouette holding a bottle.
panels.name: HL-I-DA-3A

panels.description: The man speaks. Close up.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Ayran! What the heck, you damn scoundrel...
where have you been all this time?

panels.name: HL-I-DA-3B

panels.description: Ayran in the kitchen, behind his father.
panels.name: HL-I-DA-4A

panels.description: Ayran in the kitchen, behind his father.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: I was...
Shut up!

panels.name: HL-I-DA-4B

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: I know where you were...
Always wasting time with the Melukkim!
Human filth they are, frickin' immigrants!!!

panels.description: Mingoor stands up. Getting closer to Ayran.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Ah, come on dad, they're...
I said SHUT-UP!

panels.name: HL-I-DA-6

panels.description:
Mingoor standing up, turns head aside but doesn't look to Ayran.  
Still raging face and big glass-like eyes.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: dammit son, are you blinder than yo' old father?
those people ain't ANYTHING like us!

panels.name: HL-I-DA-7

panels.description: Mingoor getting calmer.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: that Birun dude is taking you to the wrong path.
Ayran, they don't share our values...

panels.name: HL-I-DA-8

panels.description: Pointing the hand to the back.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Now lend a hand to your sister. I'm hungry.
Now... where is my sweetie?

panels.name: HL-I-DA-9

panels.description: Going towards the ladder.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Shildigook!

panels.name: HL-I-DA-10A

panels.description: Shildigook runs towards the house.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Wof wof!

panels.name: HL-I-DA-10B

panels.description: Mingoor and Shildigook meet in the courtyard.
panels.name: HL-I-DA-11A

panels.description: Mingoor and Shildigook showing affection.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: My beautiful, beautiful one...
Thank God, I have you.

panels.name: HL-I-DA-11B

panels.description: Zooming out, air view of the property.
panels.name: HL-I-DA-12

panels.description: Zoom onto Kindun's face.
panels.name: HL-I-DB-1A

panels.description: I tell ya guys...
panels.name: HL-I-DB-1B

panels.description: Overview of Birun's dining room and who is in there.
panels.name: HL-I-DB-2

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: in Melukka, girls and boys your age are already fathers and mothers!

panels.description: Not wasting the day like you two do!
panels.name: HL-I-DB-3B

panels.description: Going towards Kindun, sarcastic.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Hey, if girls and boys in Melukka end up like you, then I'm happy to become an old-maid...

panels.name: HL-I-DB-4A

panels.description: Dilgun's mum (Tomsun) chiming in.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Don't you dare to talk to our guest like that, miss Dilgun!

panels.name: HL-I-DB-4B

panels.description: Kindun with a gentle smile to Tomsun.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Ah, don't you worry Tomsun my dear...
She's got some fierce Melukkim temper in her young veins
And that's good

panels.name: HL-I-DB-5

panels.description: Kindun back to Birun and Dilgun.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: I'll tell ya more... not only guys your age are already parents...
They are also fearsome warriors!

panels.name: HL-I-DB-6

panels.description:
Birun and Dilgun both excited, Birun also marvelled.  
They reply to Kindun.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: ahh... this I like more!
Really? How? And what are they going to fight for?

panels.name: HL-I-DB-7

panels.description: Kindun to Dilgun and Birun who stare.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Well my dears, you have heard about the crisis, haven't you?

panels.name: HL-I-DB-8A

panels.description: Then to Barsun, Birun's father.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Barsun, you have heard about the crisis, haven't you?

panels.name: HL-I-DB-8B

panels.description: Barsun, who was doing the dishes, turns around.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Crisis? What crisis?

panels.name: HL-I-DB-9

panels.description: Kindun very surprised, getting straight from the sofa.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Are you telling me that no tidings of the crisis have arrived yet to this corner of Silkha?
Uncle Kindun, what are you talking about?

panels.name: HL-I-DB-10

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: > Kindun: What am I talking about?
My friends, the allied kingdoms of Vintuka have formally recalled their delegations from all Western regions
including Silkhan land

panels.description: Birun turns to Barsun.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Dad, what does that mean?

panels.name: HL-I-DB-12A

panels.description: Dilgun harshly to Birun.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: It means war, you idiot!

panels.name: HL-I-DB-12B

panels.description: Tomsun reassuring to Birun, petrifying glaze to Dilgun.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: well dear, it's not technically war yet... but it might end up being one.
But Kindun, tell us more... how... and why?

panels.name: HL-I-DB-13

panels.description: Kindun narrating, Silkhan resources.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: oh well, you know, Vintuka has always had a foot in the Western countries
especially in Silkhan land, because of the timber, the water supplies, the rice crops and the livestock

panels.name: HL-I-DB-14

panels.description: Barsun drying the dishes narrating, image of Vintuka.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: indeed! population in Vintuka has been growing steadily
they've got the knowledge, the machinery and the trading ships...

panels.name: HL-I-DB-15

panels.description: but that's not something you can feed people with!
panels.name: HL-I-DB-16A

panels.description: Kindun smoking a pipe.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: indeed, my friend
And Western traders know this all too well

panels.name: HL-I-DB-16B

panels.description: Images from the Western harbors. Kindun as caption above and below.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: So, Western traders and port authorities started imposing much heavier tolls on goods
As Western harbours represent the only sustainable route for Vintukkans to get what they need from Silkhan land

panels.name: HL-I-DB-17

panels.description: Kindun to the whole family.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Problem is, Vintukans are not stupid

panels.name: HL-I-DB-18A

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Everybody knows that Silkha, and the whole West, is a free land just because Vintuka allows them to be.
Until now, conquering thw West by military force was simply more costly than buying goods from it.
But this isn't true anymore, thanks to the greed of Western traders.
that might all be true, but why does Silkha have to pay for the greed of Western traders?
I mean we source the goods that they trade, but the tolls they put on the goods is none of our business...
You know, Vintukans could not care less about whether the tolls increase is the fault of Silkhan producers, or the traders.
All they know is that Silkha has got the stuff they need...
and if Western harbour cities are the bottleneck for them to get these goods...
while conquering those harbours they might just as well take over the whole of Silkha.
Problem solved!

panels.description: Silence. Everyone is petrified.
panels.name: HL-I-DB-24A

panels.description: They look at each other.
panels.name: HL-I-DB-24B

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: But uncle Kindun, Melukka is not Vintuka...
Why are we Melukkans getting ready to fight?

panels.description: Dilgun with a hopeless face.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: I do have a stupid brother...

panels.name: HL-I-DB-26A

panels.description: Dilgun to Birun.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Did you ever notice that the Melukkan High Commander has a Vintukan surname???
Who'd you think is ruling the country of our ancestors?

panels.name: HL-I-DB-26B

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: That's quite right ma'm, but talk once more like that to your bro...
...and you can forget about attending this year's stick fight.

panels.description: Tomsun to Kindun.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Kindun, you are giving us really bad news.
When we moved to Silkha from Melukka, we were just looking for peace and prosperity.

panels.name: HL-I-DB-28A

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: It seems that all of that will soon be gone.
If war hits both of our countries, what will we do?

panels.description: Barsun to Tomsun.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: Tomsun, dear, don't be so tragic.
Nothing is lost, just yet.
I'm sure that the chief maintainers will find a deal with Vintuka and prevent a war.

panels.name: HL-I-DB-29

panels.description: Barsun to Tomsun.

dialogs.dialogContent_en_US: I hope, at least...

panels.name: HL-I-DB-30
